entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
